name: Mist
description:
This a VR horror game were the monster is made of mist and is looking for something to kill. You have to avoid the monster and try to escape but it is not that easy. The exit is locked and only by finding five keys that go into the corresponding consoles. Once all the buttons are pressed it is a race to the exit. However the monster leaves behind a trail of mist that lingers for a bit. If you touch it you might start to find your hands full.

Head Game Design:

Jon Batchelder

Jeremy Rudd

Game Development:

Brandon Engholm

Timothe Malandain
